name: Ananya Sen
comment: Absolutely love the pet friendly vibe! My dog Bruno had a blast. The pork platter is a must-try.

name: Rohan Das
comment: Great cozy ambience. Perfect for a date night. Food is premium but totally worth it.

name: Priyanka Roy
comment: Best place for pork lovers in Kolkata. The staff is so warm and welcoming to pets.
